title: Rewriting into an equation
text: The function can be rewritten as $$-\left(\frac{1}{2}\right) {\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)}^{\left(-7\right)}+6$$
speech: The function can be rewritten as ; minus; 1 half times; open paren 1 half close paren raised to the open paren negative 7 close paren power; plus 6;
